FacilityName: Wayne Farms LLC - Oakwood Further Processing

_exec_summary.SummaryText:
Wayne Farms LLC - Oakwood is a poultry processing facility that stores and uses ammonia, which is regulated by EPA's Risk Management Program.
Wayne Farms LLC - Oakwood believes that the ammonia we store and handle on site has very real and potential dangers.   However, it is important to keep the risks in perspective.  Wayne Farms LLC - Oakwood ammonia storage and handling facilities:
1.  are properly designed
2.  have effective operation and maintenance procedures
3.  employ trained operators and technicians
4.  periodically conduct safety audits, and
5.  are constantly upgrading itsr processes to meet or exceed industry standards

Wayne Farms LLC - Oakwood also has taken  a proactive approach towards coordinating emergency efforts with the Oakwood Fire Department.  The Hall County EMA has a copy of our emergency response program and is well trained and prepared to respond to potential spills and leaks that may occur at the  Wayne Farms LLC - Oakwood facility.  The Oakwood Fire Department conducts annual site visits to our facility and is prepared to respond to a possible spill or leak.

A facility which maintains high standards such as Wayne Farms LLC - Oakwood, provides less public risk that a facility that does not provide safe operations.  Wayne Farms LLC - Oakwood complies with Federal OSHA rules and guidelines for safe handling, storage and operation of its chemical systems.  We also utilize outside experts to periodically inspect our systems integrity, train system operators and upgrade the system to improve safety.  There has not been a reportable release of ammonia at this facility during the past 5 years.

Wayne Farms LLC - Oakwood used EPA's OCA Guidance to develop a model for off-site consequence analysis of ammonia.

CONCLUSION
Wayne Farms LLC - Oakwood believes that the poultry industry should proactively inform that public of the potential dangers and the actions that Wayne Farms LLC - Oakwood has taken to minimize these dangers.  Wayne Farms LLC - O

akwood has a long, great, ongoing relationship with the community.  We encourage any and all citizens who have concerns or questions to contact our facility.  We look forward to continuing our relationship in Hall County.
